org.hps.evio

Class VTPEvioReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.evio.EvioReader
      • org.hps.evio.VTPEvioReader

  • public class VTPEvioReader
extends EvioReader
    This code reads VTP banks from the EVIO, and writes it's values as a genericObject. In GenericObject there are two arrays. One represents Trigger words, and the other represents rocIDs. In particular we want to know the rocID of i-th VTP word, the we should use the i-th value of the array "rocID_vals" (see description in the code).
